unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.title: Unofficial Monumenta Mod Configuration
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.position:
Horizontal position relative to the screen (0 = left, 1 = right)
Any value works, e.g. 0.1 = 10% of the screen width from the left edge.

Vertical position relative to the screen (0 = top, 1 = bottom)
Any value works, e.g. 0.1 = 10% of the screen height from the top edge.

Absolute horizontal position offset.
This is added after the relative position has been calculated.
Negative values shift to the left, positive values shift to the right.

Absolute vertical position offset.
This is added after the relative position has been calculated.
Negative values shift upwards, positive values shift downwards.

Horizontal alignment.
0: left-aligned, 0.5: centered, 1: right-aligned.
Any value between 0 and 1 works.

Vertical alignment.
0: top-aligned, 0.5: centered, 1: bottom-aligned.
Any value between 0 and 1 works.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.o:
Render tridents using the item textures.
Requires the Monumenta resource pack to look good.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.l:
Lowers helmets and player heads worn by villagers
to fit with the model used in the Monumenta RP.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.h: Hide player heads worn by villagers
Hides player heads on villagers, as long as they aren't invisible.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.f:
Changes the Firmament and Doorway from Eternity to place prismarine/blackstone
instead of a Shulker box for faster placement.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.e: Tells you what Delve bounty you got
Shows a message under the cryptic message told by Reynart telling you what dungeon you are about to suffer in.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.c: Disable ChestSort (double right click) in the player inventory
Disable ChestSort (double right click) in the Ender Chest
Disable ChestSort (double right click) in every other type of inventory
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.n: Toggle whether to show a notification when joining or leaving an area.
The time it will take to dissipate
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.e: Allows the ability to change the rendered texture of an item by tricking Minecraft into believing that the item is another item.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.s: Silences errors that happen when a player leaves the server or changes shard
Allows the injection of the calculator when in a chest container in the plots.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.e: Toggle whether the calculator can be opened when outside plots

When this is toggled on, the player is able to open the calculator on any shard.
The calculator is disabled by default outside of Plots.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.o: (Won't be used if the Text Background setting is set to Everywhere in Accessibility Settings)
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.l: Will determine how often the mod can spam the player's chat with messages like "Stopped dropping of locked item"
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.a:
Abilities can be reordered by opening the chat and then dragging them around with the mouse.
To move the whole ability display instead, hold ctrl while clicking & dragging.
Alternatively, press the 'Edit HUD' button to move abilities and the display (assign this key in the Minecraft settings).
Show abilities
Show the ability display with cooldowns and current stacks/charges.
Show cooldown as text
Shows the cooldown as a counter in seconds as well.
Hide ability messages

Hides the usual ability-related messages from the server.
Hides messages like 'Mana Lance is now off cooldown!' and 'Sharpshooter Stacks: 1'.
This setting has no effect if 'Show abilities' is disabled.
Show in front of chat unless chat is open

When this option is enabled, the abilities will be displayed in front of chat messages
as long as the chat is not currently open.
This will draw them in front of the overlay messages as well since those are behind the chat.
Tooltips

Show tooltips when hovering over an ability while the chat is open.
Currently only displays the ability's name.
Display position:
Preset (applies on save & exit)

Applies a preset for the ability display.
Custom: uses the values set below.
Above Hotbar: Puts the abilities centered above the hotbar (default).
Right of Hotbar: Puts abilities to the right of the hotbar.
Left side of Screen: Abilities are shown vertically at the left edge of the screen.
Right side of Screen: Abilities are shown vertically at the right edge of the screen.
How duration should be rendered on a skill
Bar side:
Follows parent overlay, horizontal or vertical
Minimum position

-4 is the original position
24 mirrors the original position.
Horizontal
Enable for horizontal display, disable for vertical display.
Position of the ability display
Raw positional values of the ability display for manual adjustment.
Miscellaneous options:
Off-Cooldown resize
Briefly enlarges abilities when they get off cooldown.
Off-Cooldown flash intensity

Intensity of the flash when an ability gets off cooldown.
Set to 0% to disable the flash.
Off-Cooldown sound volume

Volume of the sound played when an ability gets off cooldown.
Set to 0% to disable the sound.
Off-Cooldown sound pitch min

Pitch of the off-cooldown sound for the first ability.
Abilities in-between get a pitch in-between these values.
Off-Cooldown sound pitch max

Pitch of the off-cooldown sound for the last ability.
Abilities in-between get a pitch in-between these values.
Use alternative off-cooldown sound
An alternative, higher pitched off-cooldown sound.
Icon size

Size of the ability icons.
The default of 32 will show icons in the same resolution as the rest of the GUI.
Icon gap

Gap between ability icons.
Can be negative to move icons closer together.
Text color
Color of the cooldown and stacks/charges counters.
Text offset

Offset of cooldown and charge counters from the edges of the icons.
Positive to move inwards, negative to move outwards.
Render in ascending order

Render from left/top to right/bottom or vice versa.
Only really matters if the icon gap is negative.
When enabled, icons to the right/bottom will be on top if they overlap, or vice versa if disabled.
Show only abilities currently on cooldown
Hides abilities not currently on cooldown.
Always show abilities with stacks

Shows abilities with stacks or changes regardless of the previous setting.
When disabled, only completely passive abilities without a cooldown are shown.
Condense abilities
When abilities are hidden due to being on cooldown, move abilities together to prevent gaps.
Show passive abilities with modes

A few passive abilities have different modes.
Enable this to see icons for these abilities showing which mode they're in.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.s: Sends information on when shard was changed, errors and other related stuff.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.e: Will show an error in chat when the the max chest value is wrong
BTW it can be disabled through the /umm disableChestCountError command
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.l: When slots are rendered will also render letters that shows that state of every special locks.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.d: Defines if the rich presence should be active or not

{player} returns the player name. 
{shard} returns the shard name. 
{holding} returns the name of the item held in main hand. 
{class} returns the name of the class the user is playing as.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.h:
Similar to a Streamer mode
Will hide the shard in Discord Rich Presence.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.e: Whether the overlay should render or not.
Can be moved with the mouse like the abilities display

When enabled, text will be right-justified.
By default (when disabled), it is left-justified.
While on, will show all cumulative effects as one.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.config.option.c: Can be moved with the mouse like the abilities display
Whether the overlay should render or not.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.whi: Rituals defiling the souls of the dead disturb hallowed halls. You must put an end to these unholy rites.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.ora: Vile experiments mutate nature's gifts for the sake of power. These must be put to an end.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.mag: A deathly spectre looms over the ruins of a once great temple... the plague must not be allowed into this world.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.lig: An eternal conflict, the mage's seal on alchemical evil... yet there is only one fate evil shall meet, and containment is not sufficient.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.yel: A once peaceful spirit, whipped up into a mindless rage by the meddling of insidious forces. I know not what must be done, but it cannot be allowed to fester any longer.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.wil: A grove of mysteries locked away behind an elemental key, for good reason. The voice of a power now taken echoes through the willow trees.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.rev: The great Genius Loci stirs in his sleep. What an awful distortion of reality this nightmare has created...
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.lim: To claim the knowledge, power, and wisdom of the gods can only end in tragedy. The imbalance from this folly must be corrected.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.pin: A blight afflicts the seasons. What was once harmony is now dissonance, and cannot remain so.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.gra: The cycle of life and death no longer holds in this civilization. The natural order must be restored.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.lig: Light shines into the mirror, but only darkness seeps out... a corruption has taken grip and must be purified.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.cya: Madness is the greatest loss, for even the memory of what once was becomes tainted. Their remembrance must be avenged.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.pur: A consuming greed envelops this hideaway lost to the sea. This hunger must be pacified.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.tea: A kingdom lost to the sands of history. Someone here seeks to deceive you, but time tells no lies.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.for: The researchers' magnum opus freed, a power now unchained. It must be stamped out, lest we all fall to the nothing from whence it came.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.shi: In attempt to keep away outsiders, the denizens of this city doomed themselves to their own shifting hell. They must be freed, one way or another.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.blu: A great upheaval is errupting within the Tree of Life. The great heads of this band of witches must be cut down, lest they unleash a powerful ritual, the consequences of which cannot be undone.
unofficial-monumenta-mod.delvebounty.bro: Tales of the Ashkii speak of the Shades, husks of their kin that have been reduced to naught but mindless flesh, and doppelgangers that infiltrate their ranks. These threats must be stamped out by removing the god that lies in the heart of Pelias’ folly.
